adjectives.description: mediumistic (comparative more mediumistic, superlative most mediumistic)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to mediums (people claiming to contact the dead); relating to or having the ability to communicate with spirits.
examples: Fear of the world, fear of man individually, fear of loss of property or station, would all interfere, and prevent them from giving to their fellow-men, teachings, that their more receptive and mediumistic minds had been capable of receiving.
